text:
Any MacroTools users know why this isn't matching? Bug?
```julia> @capture(:x, (name_Symbol :: T_) | name_Symbol)
false

julia> @capture(:(x::T), (name_Symbol :: T_) | name_Symbol)
false```

text:
Bug? I always found the | thing a bit temperamental, fwiw.
```julia> @capture(1, (nn_Symbol | ii_Int))
false

julia> @capture(1, nn_Symbol | ii_Int)
false

julia> @capture(1, (nn_Symbol | ii_))
true

julia> @capture(1, nn_Symbol | ii_ )
true```
